plot: Paris 1847. A British Lord, Lord Henry Seymour, is famous for his eccentricities. The aristocracy disapproves of his frequenting of the dregs of society and his support of destitute people....
title: Milord l'Arsouille

cast.role: Lord Henry de Seymour dit Milord l'Arsouille
